text: Ne toto khwaruma Abarumwa befu nende bimanyisio binoosia, ne nikhubeshilia eshitabu nende eshichelo, kho Abandu beme khubwatoto, ne nikhwishia eshichuma shia amani amanji nende obukhoonyi khubandu, kho Nyasaye amanye ni wina umuhabina nende Abarumwa bebe khumakhuwa kefisile, toto Nyasaye niwa Amani Omushili muno
